titles.title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2013
To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure of crop insurance premium subsidies in the public interest.
Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: Crop Insurance Subsidy Transparency Act of 2013 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to require annual disclosure to the public of specified crop insurance premium subsidy information.
